content:
# I have successfully gathered 20 iron ore in addition to the 20 coal I previously collected. 
# Now, I need to smelt the iron ore into iron plates, which will allow me to craft the Burner Mining Drill.

# However, to smelt iron ore into iron plates, I need a furnace. Since I currently don't have one, I will need to craft a stone furnace first.

# Let's check the crafting requirements for the Stone Furnace to ensure I have the necessary materials.

furnace_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.StoneFurnace)

# The Stone Furnace requires stone, so I will need to gather some stone as well. 
# I will locate the nearest stone resource patch.

stone_patch_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Find the position of the nearest stone patch
move_to(stone_patch_position)  # Move to the stone patch location

# Harvest some stone to craft the Stone Furnace.
harvested_stone_quantity = harvest_resource(stone_patch_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 stone

# Now, I will check the inventory again to confirm I have enough materials to craft the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting stone: {inspect_inventory()}")
